The Complete Series DVD Should Also Be A Box Set.
The Complete Series DVD Should Contain Bonus Features And Special Features.

data.text:
The Penguins of Madagascar Has 3 Seasons And 149 episodes, Nickelodeon And Viacom Please Give The Penguins of Madagascar The Home Video Rights To Shout! Factory On DVD.

The Complete Series DVD Should Also Be A Box Set.

The Complete Series DVD Should Contain Bonus Features And Special Features.

The Complete Series DVD Should Contain Subtitles.

Please Contact Shout! Factory And Ask Kindly For Them To Release The Penguins Of Madagascar On A On DVD:https://www.shoutfactory.com/corp/contact-us

At Least 1000 Signatures, This Petition Will Probably Go To Victory.
